name: Dimensions
description:
Dimensions is a simple utility to help with annotation of your designs.


Select the objects you want to mark up and click the type of annotation you want;


  • Width by height with a label at the top
  • Width by height with a label at the bottom
  • Gaps between horizontal objects
  • Gaps between vertical objects
  • Margins above and below overlapping objects
  • Margins left and right of overlapping objects
  • Height left
  • Height right
  • Width top
  • Width below
  • Selection frame labelled above
  • Selection frame labelled below
  • Text style left
  • Text style right
  • Text style above
  • Text style below
  • Color styles left
  • Color styles right
  • Color styles above
  • Color styles below
  • Corner radius top left
  • Corner radius top right
  • Corner radius bottom right
  • Corner radius bottom left
